result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Bauer Affidavit in Support of Defendant's Motion for Reduction of Bail
Defendant's Motion for the Reduction of Bail
Defendant's Motion for the Reduction of Bail
Atty Joseph Bauer

Clerk: Amanda.
Case called at 2:23 pm.
INCLUDES: 22CM755, 22CM76 and 22CM476. 
State appears by ADA Hannah Boeck. Defendant appears from MCJ with Atty Fontana. 
Date and Time set for IA; VRCW. 

COURT QUASHES WARRANTS. 

Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
Court questions deft re: complaint and rights.
Advised Right of Counsel. 

PLEA:  NOT GUILTY.

COURT ORDERS: $100 cash bond to cover all files - new CONDITIONS for 22CM755: 
- No contact with CO-deft(s): R.L. Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.
- Absolute sobriety from, and no possession of controlled substances, except prescriptions taken as prescribed. 
- Prints and photograph. 
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.  

>>FUTURE DATES: 
PTC: 9/14 at 1:50 pm.

Updated address: 
400 E Thomas Street Wausau WI
715-600-6913


Adj: 2:28 pm.

INCLUDES 22CM755, 22CM76 & 22CM476: No contact with co-defendant(s):  R.L. (22CM755) No contact with J.L.W. (22CM476 & 22CM76). Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney. Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed. Shall have his/her fingerprints and photograph taken at the Sheriff's Dept. Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (4) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.
